ar.main.privacy_policy_text:
ğŸ” Atlas Secure Privacy Policy

Atlas Secure is built on the principle
of data minimization.

We don't collect and don't store information
that is not required for service operation.

What we DON'T store:
â€¢ connection history
â€¢ IP addresses and network traffic
â€¢ DNS queries
â€¢ data about visited resources
â€¢ user activity metadata

Service architecture is implemented
on Zero-Logs principle.

What may be processed:
â€¢ access status
â€¢ subscription validity period
â€¢ technical key identifier

This data is not linked
to your network activity.

Payments:
Atlas Secure doesn't process
and doesn't store payment data.
Payment goes through
banking and payment systems
outside our infrastructure.

Data sharing:
We don't share data with third parties
and don't use trackers,
analytics or advertising SDKs.

Support:
We process only information
that you voluntarily provide
for resolving a specific request.

Atlas Secure.
Privacy is embedded
in service architecture.
